title: 56. Roomie Chats: Skincare Influencers, Cerave, Embarassing Spa Moments, Study Hacks + Blocking Out the Social Media Haters.
description:
Hi Roomies!! In this episode we are keepinng it caj and answering some of your esthetician listener questions! We discuss how to deal with haters (online, in the work place, etc), tips for note taking in school, how to handle a toxic work place, overcoming mistakes in the treatment room/ spa, our most embarrassing moment in the spa, cerave + the drugstore product conversation, overcoming haters, and the dark side of social media. 

  • Huge thanks to Podcorn for sponsoring this episode. Podcorn is a marketplace connecting podcasters to amazing podcast  sponsorship opportunities such as Host-Read Ads, Interview Segments,  Topical Discussions, and more at podcorn.com.
  • Explore sponsorship  opportunities and start monetizing your podcast by signing up here: https://podcorn.com/podcasters/
  • This episode is also sponsored by Forager Project, a 100% organic plant-based California food company. Forager wants to inspire everyone to get out and vote and participate in our democracy. 
  • GET OUT AND VOTE! They have provided voting resources and information for you at www.​foragerproject.com/vote​ and on social @foragerproject

If you find value in this episode it would mean so much if you left us a 5 star review on iTunes-- it helps other professionals find us and appreciate us as credible sources.

Waxing Resource: @lashandwaxoc

EPISODE 24 w/ waxing expert: 

https://open.spotify.com/episode/4FH8Jf9mBlfE32EcuNOexn?si=rTuz66E_Q7SOA4nS4GYG3Q

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa.dermaplus + Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly 

Tess' TikTok: @myestytessa.dermaplus

Lauren's Instagram: @laurens.esthetics + Lauren's YouTube: Lauren Kruger

Lauren's Blog: www.lauren-kruger.com
